function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependency on the competence of designers and responsibility of builders for health in design solutions","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary approach between technical and health backgrounds","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness among stakeholders of factors affecting health in living spaces","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Little shared vocabulary among disciplines","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicting building and hygiene regulations","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Profound housing crisis highlighted by covid-19 pandemic","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labour shortages due to lockdown, furlough scheme, and workforce infections","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe impact on cashflow, funding, and project costs","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on mental health of workers","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Late public health response by the uk government","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low productivity and job losses due to public health measures","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased output of construction industry due to withdrawal of government intervention","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labour shortages in the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cholera and yellow fever epidemics in buenos aires between 1867 and 1871","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on lower-caste hindu population","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hypochondriacal fears of europeans of catching diseases from native bodies such as malaria, cholera, and dysentery.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Miasma theories explaining disease as resultant from the bad air ’emanating directly from the earth due to heat and humidity.’","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legacy of hypochondria in the development of housing for british colonizers in tropical places.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of informal settlements despite being characterized as degenerate and associated with social and contagious diseases.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of poverty, morality, and disease, leading to discriminatory urban planning and design decisions.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ’surgical’ and brutal slum clearance operations in response to contagious diseases outbreaks.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of health impacts in cities due to urban planning and interventions.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for urban planning to be divisive in interpretations of appropriate spatial interventions, exacerbating social inequality.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient social distancing among workers","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to maintain social distancing in small businesses","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing and overcrowding","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of coronavirus from animal to human","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmentally mediated transmission of covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure risk associated with high occupant density and consistent contact demonstrated in covid-19 outbreaks","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 transmission through aerosols","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases through droplets and aerosolization in the built environment","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of the sharing economy on infectious disease transmission in shared spaces such as coworking environments, homes, and transportation.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact and spatial proximity with infected persons","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of social distancing measures in local communities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing outside air fractions may lead to increased energy consumption","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High airflow rates without increased outside air fraction can increase transmission potential of contagious diseases","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial configurations designed to encourage social interactions may inadvertently enhance opportunities for transmission of viruses.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited options for social-distancing measures in health care facilities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cohousing patients with vastly different requirements","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate morbidity and mortality of specific ethnic populations increases the risk of social and healthcare inequalities.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe restrictions to mobility exacerbating social inequalities","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritization of economy over sustainability may lead to relaxation of conservation policies and environmental measures.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial support directed at incumbent industries with high employment may hinder the development of green energy technologies.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsuitable use of global recovery funds could result in inadequate investment in sustainable energy development.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to achieve sustainable development goals sdgs by 2030","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritization of gdp over human well-being and healthy environment","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of environmental health in well-being measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overemphasis on socioeconomic welfare in well-being measures","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparent and effective governance","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"}]}
